decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice effects, removal spells, and token generation to control the board and outvalue the opponent. By sacrificing creatures like Avenging Hunter and Ichor Wellspring, while generating tokens with Khalni Garden and Thorn of the Black Rose, the deck can maintain card advantage and pressure the opponent. The addition of cards like Crypt Rats and Defile also helps in controlling the opponent's creatures, while cards like Deadly Dispute and Fanatical Offering provide additional value through sacrificing. Overall, this Golgari Garden deck aims to grind out the opponent and win through attrition.

This deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with cheap artifact creatures and utilizing cards like Thoughtcast to draw additional cards. By playing cards like All That Glitters and Galvanic Blast, the deck aims to pump up its creatures and deal damage quickly, overwhelming the opponent with its aggressive strategy. The key strategy is to get out multiple artifact creatures early on to take advantage of cards like Springleaf Drum and Glint Hawk to generate additional value and keep up the pressure on the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Arbor Elf and Utopia Sprawl, while also disrupting the opponent's mana base with cards like Thermokarst and Mwonvuli Acid-Moss. Once enough mana has been accumulated, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Generous Ent, Annoyed Altisaur, and Avenging Hunter. Additionally, the inclusion of Skred provides removal for opposing threats, and Llanowar Visionary helps to draw more cards and keep the aggression going.

The key concept of this deck is to gain control over the game by utilizing the Urzatron lands to generate massive amounts of mana and cast powerful spells like Mulldrifter and Mnemonic Wall. The deck also focuses on card advantage and disruption with cards like Mystical Teachings and Prohibit. Additionally, it includes key interaction pieces such as Ghostly Flicker and Ephemerate to create value and outmaneuver the opponent. The inclusion of Moment's Peace and Weather the Storm helps the deck survive aggressive strategies, while Bojuka Bog and Pulse of Murasa provide graveyard hate and recursion options.
